forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: replacing multiple things at once

comments.text: you can replace all instances of an item in the area by clone-editing that item (context-laser and hit "edit clone"), then in the "..." settings, set "replace instances in area".
choose "replace instances in area (one-time)" to do the same, but not for successive edits.
you can also globally delete all placements in the area by going to the area dialog (the mountain icon) and following the copy & paste button there.
to remove multiple thrown or emitted items (instead of waiting 30 seconds for them to automatically disappear), you can clean them with a big liquid shape.

thread.latestCommentText: to remove multiple thrown or emitted items (instead of waiting 30 seconds for them to automatically disappear), you can clean them with a big liquid shape.
